refnamediv.refpurpose: Read sampled sound from a table with looping and high precision.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: lposcila reads sampled sound from a table with looping and high precision.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ar lposcila aamp, kfreqratio, kloop, kend, ift [,iphs]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kfreqratio -- multiply factor of table frequency (for example: 1 = original frequency, 1.5 = a fifth up , .5 = an octave down)
lposcila is the same as lposcil, but has an audio-rate amplitude argument (instead of k-rate) to allow fast envelope transients.
